function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 in the tourism and travel sector","Impact":"Significant financial losses, slowdown in GDP, disruption of the economy","Mitigation":"Implementing urgent measures, providing state aid, easy access to loans, enforcing social distancing","Technologies":"Health screening technologies, digital contact tracing, online visa services","People":"Tourists, travelers, tourism and travel sector employees","Owner":"National governments, public and private organizations in the travel and tourism sector"},{"Description":"Impact of border closures and travel restrictions on the aviation industry","Impact":"Unprecedented wave of cancellations, drop in demand, disruption of the economy","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, providing financial relief to affected businesses","Technologies":"Health screening technologies, contactless check-in systems, digital ticketing services","People":"Airlines, airport staff, travelers","Owner":"Government authorities, aviation industry stakeholders"}]}
